Package au.csiro.pathling.terminology

Class BaseTerminologyService

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.utilities.ResourceCloser
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.BaseTerminologyService
All Implemented Interfaces:
TerminologyService, Closeable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CachingTerminologyService, DefaultTerminologyService
public abstract class BaseTerminologyService extends ResourceCloser implements TerminologyService
Common functionality for all implementations of TerminologyService.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseTerminologyService

      protected BaseTerminologyService(@Nonnull TerminologyClient terminologyClient, @Nonnull Closeable... resourcesToClose)
      Creates a new base terminology service with the specified terminology client and resources.
      Parameters:
      terminologyClient - the client for communicating with the terminology server
      resourcesToClose - additional resources that should be closed when this service is closed

  • Method Details

    • handleError

      @Nullable public static <T> T handleError(@Nonnull BaseServerResponseException e, @Nullable T invalidInputReturnValue)
      This method allows us to be tolerant to invalid inputs to terminology operations, which produce 400-series errors from the terminology server. A result can be provided which will be returned in the event of such an error.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the result
      Parameters:
      e - the exception that was thrown
      invalidInputReturnValue - the value to return in the event of an invalid input
      Returns:
      the result, which may be the fallback
